title: Invariant subspaces of perturbed backward shift
abstract:
We represent closed subspaces of the Hardy space that are invariant under
finite-rank perturbations of the backward shift. We apply this to classify
almost invariant subspaces of the backward shift and represent a more refined
version of nearly invariant subspaces. Kernels of certain perturbed Toeplitz
operators are examples of the newly introduced nearly invariant subspaces.
